mapper.select: SELECT a.seq , a.title , a.discount , a.price , (SELECT b.cdname_ko FROM Code b WHERE 1=1 AND a.shippingfee = b.seq) AS fee , (SELECT b.cdname_ko FROM Code b WHERE 1=1 AND a.deliverymethod = b.seq) AS delivery , a.stock , a.regDate , a.modDate , a.useNY , a.delNY
SELECT title , discount , price , shippingfee , deliverymethod , stock , regDate , useNY , delNY FROM item WHERE 1=1 AND seq = #{seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE item SET delNY = 1 WHERE seq = #{seq}
